title: The Letters of Robert Louis Stevenson - Volume 2
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: 'You give me very much the effect of a coward, Mr. Stevenson!'  I had very nearly left two vices behind me at Glenogil - fishing and jesting at table.

title: The Letters of Robert Louis Stevenson - Volume 2
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: By the way, I was twice in Kirriemuir, I believe in the year '71, when I was going on a visit to Glenogil.
